ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿OFFICAL The World Bank W (202) 473-1000 INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT 1 Cable Address: INTBAFRAD INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION U.S.A. Cable Address: INDEVAS Date: 2.- - H2- 20-1L Ms. Eva Corral Deputy Head, Trade for Development Trade Policy Unit Department for International Development 1 Victoria Street, SW1H OET, London United Kingdom Amendment to the Administration Arrangement between the Department for International Development and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association concerning the Multi-Donor Trust Fund for the Trade Facilitation Facility (TF071220) - (DFID Aries Project Code 200640) Dear Ms. Corral: 1. We refer to the Administration Arrangement between the Department for International Development (the "Donor") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and the International Development Association (IDA), (collectively, the "Bank") regarding the Multi-Donor Trust Fund for the Trade Facilitation Facility (TF 071220) (the "Trust Fund") effective June 10, 2009, as amended (the "Administration Arrangement"). 2. Pursuant to the recent discussions between the Bank and the Donor, the Bank proposes to amend paragraph 8.1 of Annex 2 of the Administration Arrangement to read as follows: "8.1 It is expected that the Contributions will be fully disbursed by the Bank in accordance with the provisions of this Arrangement by July 31, 2015. The Bank will only disburse Contributions for the purposes of this Arrangement after such date with the written approval of the Donors." 3. All other terms of the Administration Arrangement will remain the same. 4. The Bank will disclose this Amendment and related information on this Trust Fund in accordance with the World Bank Policy on Access to Information. By entering into this Amendment, the Donor consents to disclosure of this Amendment and related information on this Trust Fund. RCA 248423. U WUI 64145 L FAX (202) 477-6391
ï»¿-2- 5. We propose that this letter will constitute an amendment to the Administration Arrangement between the Bank and the Donor. Please confirm your acceptance to the foregoing, on behalf of the Donor, by signing and dating the two originals, retaining one original for your records and returning the other original to the Bank. Upon receipt by the Bank of the original Amendment countersigned by you, this Amendment will become effective as of the date of the countersignature. Sincerely, INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION Anabel Gonzalez Senior Director Trade and Competitiveness Global Practice CONFIRMED AND AGREED: DEPARTMENT FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT By: _ __ Date: -L3 -q-2- 0 - Eva Corral Deputy Head, Trade for Development, Trade Policy Unit
